game.name: Dragons Invade Scotland
game.shortDescription: Match-3 Tower Defense. Defend real Scottish castles from waves of dragons. Real Scottish stories and legends. Includes a full map of Scotland to scale where 1 tile is 19.5 meters.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Match-3 Tower Defense. Defend real Scottish castles from waves of dragons. Real Scottish stories and legends. Includes a full map of Scotland to scale where 1 tile is 19.5 meters.
